EmailTemplate.name: TKD_Tollgate_Reject
EmailTemplate.subject: Takedown "{!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name}" has been rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User,
You are receiving this notification because the Takedown CP {!Takedowns_Contingency_plan__c.Name} has been rejected, the record will change to coverted stage. Please, review and change the stage again to submit for approval. If you want to see the record in Salesforce, click here .
Regards, Engenium Capital.
